SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

de.uos.dgrlvq
Class DGRLVQClassifier

java.lang.Object
  de.uos.dgrlvq.DGRLVQClassifier
public class DGRLVQClassifier
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements the Dynamic version of GRLVQ algoritm as DGRLVQ classifier with many more additions. Prototypes can be generated and killed in a dynamic enviornment.

Author:
Gulraj Singh Mrok, University Osnabrück, Germany

DGRLVQClassifier

public DGRLVQClassifier(int nppc,
                        double[][][] pattern,
                        int[] validNumberOfPattern,
                        double lrc,
                        double lrw,
                        double lrl,
                        int lpd,
                        boolean nl,
                        boolean withMeanAllocation,
                        boolean isKillingAllowed,
                        int wc,
                        int maxPoputationAllowedToDie,
                        int numOfCategories,
                        int pl,
                        int pd,
                        DistanceInterface d)
creates new classifier object

Parameters:
nppc - initial number of prototypes per category
pattern - pattern
validNumberOfPattern - valid number of pattern per class
lrc - learning rate correct
lrw - learing rate wrong
lrl - learing rate lambda
lpd - decay of learning in persentage
nl - normlize lambda if true
withMeanAllocation - allocation with by mean method
isKillingAllowed - true if killing of prototype is allowed
wc - winner count
maxPoputationAllowedToDie - persentage of prototype population allowed to die
numOfCategories - number of categories
pl - pattern length
pd - pattern dimention
d - distance reference

DGRLVQClassifier

public DGRLVQClassifier(java.util.Vector prototypePropertiesList)
creates new object for testing. a vector containing all information to construct a classifier is sent as argument. from this vector all the system variable information is attained and prototypes are assigned.

Parameters:
prototypePropertiesList - properties list
